page.title: 04BIOGRAPHY
page.content: Mr Tennant is the priest in charge of Clyst Hydon and Clyst St Lawrence churches.With the help of the river Mr Tennant links the two communities together.As well as going to Clyst Hydon church and Clyst St Lawrence church he also has to go to Talaton church and Clyst St William church.He lives in a vicarage in Talaton.No two Sundays in Mr Tennants life are the same.He has to attend buisness meetings and discuss matters with the church wardens about the churchyards. He does most of his work on Sundays but a lot of the meetings and conferences are on weekdays.He also helps to organize Carol services, Harvest festivals and other big services.
